Quote: When love beckons to you, follow him, Though his ways are hard and steep. And when his wings enfold you yield to him, Though the sword hidden among his pinions may wound you.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Love one another, but make not a bond of love: Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Art is a step from what is obvious and well-known toward what is arcane and concealed.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Knowledge of the self is the mother of all knowledge. So it is incumbent on me to know my self, to know it completely, to know its minutiae, its characteristics, its subtleties, and its very atoms.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Advance, and never halt, for advancing is perfection. Advance and do not fear the thorns in the path, for they draw only corrupt blood.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Your friend is your needs answered.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: The eye of a human being is a microscope, which makes the world seem bigger than it really is.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: What difference is there between us, save a restless dream that follows my soul but fears to come near you?
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: No man can reveal to you nothing but that which already lies half-asleep in the dawning of your knowledge.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: When you work you are a flute through whose heart the whispering of the hours turns to music. Which of you would be a reed, dumb and silent, when all else sings together in unison?
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: I existed from all eternity and, behold, I am here; and I shall exist till the end of time, for my being has no end.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Where is the justice of political power if it executes the murderer and jails the plunderer, and then itself marches upon neighboring lands, killing thousands and pillaging the very hills?
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Time has been transformed, and we have changed; it has advanced and set us in motion; it has unveiled its face, inspiring us with bewilderment and exhilaration.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: They consider me to have sharp and penetrating vision because I see them through the mesh of a sieve.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: You pray in your distress and in your need; would that you might also pray in the fullness of your joy and in your days of abundance.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Poverty is a veil that obscures the face of greatness. An appeal is a mask covering the face of tribulation.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Are you a politician asking what your country can do for you or a zealous one asking what you can do for your country? If you are the first, then you are a parasite; if the second, then you are an oasis in the desert.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Exaggeration is truth that has lost its temper.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: All our words are but crumbs that fall down from the feast of the mind.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Nor shall derision prove powerful against those who listen to humanity or those who follow in the footsteps of divinity, for they shall live forever. Forever.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: If the grandfather of the grandfather of Jesus had known what was hidden within him, he would have stood humble and awe-struck before his soul.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: The just is close to the people's heart, but the merciful is close to the heart of God.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Many a doctrine is like a window pane. We see truth through it but it divides us from truth.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: The person you consider ignorant and insignificant is the one who came from God, that he might learn bliss from grief and knowledge from gloom.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Rebellion without truth is like spring in a bleak, arid desert.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Hallow the body as a temple to comeliness and sanctify the heart as a sacrifice to love; love recompenses the adorers.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Wisdom stands at the turn in the road and calls upon us publicly, but we consider it false and despise its adherents.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Knowledge cultivates your seeds and does not sow in your seeds.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Most people who ask for advice from others have already resolved to act as it pleases them.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: If the other person injures you, you may forget the injury; but if you injure him you will always remember.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: If my survival caused another to perish, then death would be sweeter and more beloved.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: When we turn to one another for counsel we reduce the number of our enemies.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: You have your ideology and I have mine.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: Would that I were a dry well, and that the people tossed stones into me, for that would be easier than to be a spring of flowing water that the thirsty pass by, and from which they avoid drinking.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: What is this world that is hastening me toward I know not what, viewing me with contempt?
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Rather be dead than cool.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Punk is musical freedom. It's saying, doing and playing what you want. In Webster's terms, 'nirvana' means freedom from pain, suffering and the external world, and that's pretty close to my definition of Punk Rock.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: The sun is gone, but I have a light.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: The duty of youth is to challenge corruption.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: If you die you're completely happy and your soul somewhere lives on. I'm not afraid of dying. Total peace after death, becoming someone else is the best hope I've got.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I like to complain and do nothing to make things better.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: If it's illegal to rock and roll, throw my ass in jail!
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: A friend is nothing but a known enemy.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I started being really proud of the fact that I was gay even though I wasn't.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm not well-read, but when I read, I read well.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm so happy because today I found my friends - they're in my head.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: The worst crime is faking it.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Drugs are a waste of time. They destroy your memory and your self-respect and everything that goes along with with your self-esteem. They're no good at all.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm too busy acting like I'm not Naive. I've seen it all, I was here first.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I sing and play the guitar, and I'm a walking, talking bacterial infection.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: If I wouldn't have found Courtney, I probably would have carried on with a bisexual lifestyle.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I bought a gun and chose drugs instead.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I had a really good childhood up until I was nine, then a classic case of divorce really affected me.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I really haven't had that exciting of a life. There are a lot of things I wish I would have done, instead of just sitting around and complaining about having a boring life. So I pretty much like to make it up. I'd rather tell a story about somebody else.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: We're so trendy we can't even escape ourselves.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I won't eat anything green.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I like to make people feel happy and superior in their reaction towards my appearance.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I really miss being able to blend in with people.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Rap music is the only vital form of music introduced since punk rock.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: If you ever need anything please don't hesitate to ask someone else first.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: There's nothing better than having a baby. I've always loved children. I used to work summers at the YMCA and be in charge of, like, 30 preschool kids. I knew that when I had a child, I'd be overwhelmed, and it's true... I can't tell you how much my attitude has changed since we've got Frances. Holding my baby is the best drug in the world.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: We have no right to express an opinion until we know all of the answers.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I never wanted to sing. I just wanted to play rhythm guitar - hide in the back and just play.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: When I heard the Pixies for the first time, I connected with that band so heavily I should have been in that band - or at least in a Pixies cover band.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I definitely feel closer to the feminine side of the human being than I do the male - or the American idea of what a male is supposed to be. Just watch a beer commercial and you'll see what I mean.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I like to have strong opinions with nothing to back them up with besides my primal sincerity. I like sincerity. I lack sincerity.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I've never been a very prolific person, so when creativity flows, it flows. I find myself scribbling on little notepads and pieces of loose paper, which results in a very small portion of my writings to ever show up in true form.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I was looking for something a lot heavier, yet melodic at the same time. Something different from heavy metal, a different attitude.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm a spokesman for myself. It just so happens that there's a bunch of people that are concerned with what I have to say. I find that frightening at times because I'm just as confused as most people. I don't have the answers for anything.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I wanted to have the adoration of John Lennon but have the anonymity of Ringo Starr. I didn't want to be a frontman. I just wanted to be back there and still be a rock and roll star at the same time.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Sometimes I wish I had taken the Bob Dylan route and sang songs where my voice would not go out on me every night, so I could have a career if I wanted.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I don't blame the average seventeen-year-old punk-rock kid for calling me a sellout. I understand that. And maybe when they grow up a little bit, they'll realize there's more things to life than living out your rock & roll identity so righteously.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Out of all the guitars in the whole world, the Fender Mustang is my favorite. They're cheap and totally inefficient, and they sound like crap and are very small.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: My songs have always been frustrating themes, relationships that I've had. And now that I'm in love, I expect it to be really happy, or at least there won't be half as much anger as there was.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I thought I would try to be gay for a while, but I'm just more sexually attracted to women. But I'm really glad that I found a few gay friends, because it totally saved me from becoming a monk or something.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I've had this terrible stomach problem for years, and that has made touring difficult. People would see me sitting in the corner by myself looking sick and gloomy. The reason is that I was trying to fight against the stomach pain, trying to hold my food down. People looked me and assumed I was some kind of addict.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I have to admit I've found myself doing the same things that a lot of other rock stars do or are forced to do. Which is not being able to respond to mail, not being able to keep up on current music, and I'm pretty much locked away a lot. The outside world is pretty foreign to me.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I never listen to 'Nevermind.' I haven't listened to it since we put it out. That says something.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I didn't know how to deal with success. If there was a Rock Star 101, I would have liked to take it. It might have helped me.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: My mother encouraged me to be artistic. It was written in a contract at an early age that I would be an artist.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: My body is damaged from music in two ways. I have a red irritation in my stomach. It's psychosomatic, caused by all the anger and the screaming. I have scoliosis, where the curvature of your spine is bent, and the weight of my guitar has made it worse. I'm always in pain, and that adds to the anger in our music.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: John Lennon was definitely my favorite Beatle, hands down.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I've always wanted male friends that I could be real intimate with and talk about important things with and be as affectionate with that person as I would be with a girl.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm really interested in smells. I think I'd like to own a perfumery someday.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: When I listen to 'Nevermind,' I hate the production, but there's something about it that almost makes me cry at times.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Every time I see documentaries or infomercials about little kids with cancer, I just freak out. It affects me on the highest emotional level... Anytime I think about it, it makes me sadder than anything I can think of.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I'm left-handed, and it's not very easy to find reasonably priced, high-quality left-handed guitars. But out of all the guitars in the whole world, the Fender Mustang is my favorite. I've only owned two of them.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I get a thrill meeting kids who are into alternative music.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I've always had a problem with the average macho man - they've always been a threat to me.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Throughout my life, I've always been really close with girls and made friends with girls. And I've always been a really sickly, feminine person anyhow, so I thought I was gay for a while because I didn't find any of the girls in my high school attractive at all.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I wanted to be in a punk band before I had even heard any punk music.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I like guitars in the Fender style because they have skinny necks.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Looking back on the production of 'Nevermind,' I'm embarrassed by it now. It's closer to a Motley Crue record than it is a punk rock record.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I own a '66 Jaguar. That's the guitar I polish, and baby - I refuse to let anyone touch it when I jump into the crowd.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: I've never considered musical equipment very sacred.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Ever since the beginning of rock and roll, there's been an Axl Rose. And it's just boring. It's totally boring to me.
Author: Kurt Cobain

Quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who knows others is wise. He who knows himself is enlightened.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Treat those who are good with goodness, and also treat those who are not good with goodness. Thus goodness is attained. Be honest to those who are honest, and be also honest to those who are not honest. Thus honesty is attained.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: When the best leader's work is done the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Those who have knowledge, don't predict. Those who predict, don't have knowledge.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Governing a great nation is like cooking a small fish - too much handling will spoil it.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Truthful words are not beautiful; beautiful words are not truthful. Good words are not persuasive; persuasive words are not good.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: An ant on the move does more than a dozing ox.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The Tao that can be told is not the eternal Tao; the name that can be named is not the eternal name. The Nameless is the origin of Heaven and Earth; the Named is the mother of all things.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Respond intelligently even to unintelligent treatment.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: To see things in the seed, that is genius.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Be the chief but never the lord.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The snow goose need not bathe to make itself white. Neither need you do anything but be yourself.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: To lead people walk behind them.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: When virtue is lost, benevolence appears, when benevolence is lost right conduct appears, when right conduct is lost, expedience appears. Expediency is the mere shadow of right and truth; it is the beginning of disorder.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The wise man does not lay up his own treasures. The more he gives to others, the more he has for his own.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The power of intuitive understanding will protect you from harm until the end of your days.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Man's enemies are not demons, but human beings like himself.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: From caring comes courage.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Fill your bowl to the brim and it will spill. Keep sharpening your knife and it will blunt.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to. If you are not afraid of dying, there is nothing you cannot achieve.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The wicked leader is he who the people despise. The good leader is he who the people revere. The great leader is he who the people say, 'We did it ourselves.'
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: When a nation is filled with strife, then do patriots flourish.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The more laws and order are made prominent, the more thieves and robbers there will be.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: In the world there is nothing more submissive and weak than water. Yet for attacking that which is hard and strong nothing can surpass it.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: One who is too insistent on his own views, finds few to agree with him.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The softest things in the world overcome the hardest things in the world.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Simulated disorder postulates perfect discipline; simulated fear postulates courage; simulated weakness postulates strength.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Violence, even well intentioned, always rebounds upon oneself.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who is contented is rich.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Nature is not human hearted.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: To know yet to think that one does not know is best; Not to know yet to think that one knows will lead to difficulty.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: I do not concern myself with gods and spirits either good or evil nor do I serve any.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The words of truth are always paradoxical.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Of all that is good, sublimity is supreme. Succeeding is the coming together of all that is beautiful. Furtherance is the agreement of all that is just. Perseverance is the foundation of all actions.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: From wonder into wonder existence opens.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is small.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The sage does not hoard. The more he helps others, the more he benefits himself, The more he gives to others, the more he gets himself. The Way of Heaven does one good but never does one harm. The Way of the sage is to act but not to compete.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The people are hungry: It is because those in authority eat up too much in taxes.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Ambition has one heel nailed in well, though she stretch her fingers to touch the heavens.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: There was something undifferentiated and yet complete, which existed before Heaven and Earth. Soundless and formless, it depends on nothing and does not change. It operates everywhere and is free from danger. It may be considered the mother of the universe. I do not know its name; I call it Tao.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Without stirring abroad, One can know the whole world; Without looking out of the window One can see the way of heaven. The further one goes The less one knows.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: People in their handlings of affairs often fail when they are about to succeed. If one remains as careful at the end as he was at the beginning, there will be no failure.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Because of a great love, one is courageous.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: It is better to do one's own duty, however defective it may be, than to follow the duty of another, however well one may perform it. He who does his duty as his own nature reveals it, never sins.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who talks more is sooner exhausted.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Govern a great nation as you would cook a small fish. Do not overdo it.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who knows himself is enlightened.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Sincere words are not fine; fine words are not sincere.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: To realize that you do not understand is a virtue; Not to realize that you do not understand is a defect.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: He who obtains has little. He who scatters has much.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: A scholar who cherishes the love of comfort is not fit to be deemed a scholar.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Great indeed is the sublimity of the Creative, to which all beings owe their beginning and which permeates all heaven.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: How could man rejoice in victory and delight in the slaughter of men?
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The higher the sun ariseth, the less shadow doth he cast; even so the greater is the goodness, the less doth it covet praise; yet cannot avoid its rewards in honours.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Heaven is long-enduring, and earth continues long. The reason why heaven and earth are able to endure and continue thus long is because they do not live of, or for, themselves.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The career of a sage is of two kinds: He is either honored by all in the world, Like a flower waving its head, Or else he disappears into the silent forest.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: If you keep feeling a point that has been sharpened, the point cannot long preserve its sharpness.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: If the Great Way perishes there will morality and duty. When cleverness and knowledge arise great lies will flourish. When relatives fall out with one another there will be filial duty and love. When states are in confusion there will be faithful servants.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: All things in the world come from being. And being comes from non-being.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Man takes his law from the Earth; the Earth takes its law from Heaven; Heaven takes its law from the Tao. The law of the Tao is its being what it is.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: There are three classes of people: those who see, those who see when they are shown, those who do not see.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Iron rusts from disuse; water loses its purity from stagnation... even so does inaction sap the vigor of the mind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Nature is the source of all true knowledge. She has her own logic, her own laws, she has no effect without cause nor invention without necessity.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Where there is shouting, there is no true knowledge.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: He who wishes to be rich in a day will be hanged in a year.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Water is the driving force of all nature.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Who sows virtue reaps honor.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The beginnings and ends of shadow lie between the light and darkness and may be infinitely diminished and infinitely increased. Shadow is the means by which bodies display their form. The forms of bodies could not be understood in detail but for shadow.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: He who loves practice without theory is like the sailor who boards ship without a rudder and compass and never knows where he may cast.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Our life is made by the death of others.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Intellectual passion drives out sensuality.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Time abides long enough for those who make use of it.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: It's easier to resist at the beginning than at the end.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: He who is fixed to a star does not change his mind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Men of lofty genius sometimes accomplish the most when they work least, for their minds are occupied with their ideas and the perfection of their conceptions, to which they afterwards give form.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I have offended God and mankind because my work didn't reach the quality it should have.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Just as food eaten without appetite is a tedious nourishment, so does study without zeal damage the memory by not assimilating what it absorbs.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: There are four Powers: memory and intellect, desire and covetousness. The two first are mental and the others sensual. The three senses: sight, hearing and smell cannot well be prevented; touch and taste not at all.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The smallest feline is a masterpiece.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The function of muscle is to pull and not to push, except in the case of the genitals and the tongue.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Anyone who conducts an argument by appealing to authority is not using his intelligence; he is just using his memory.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The Medici created and destroyed me.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Blinding ignorance does mislead us. O! Wretched mortals, open your eyes!
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: You do ill if you praise, but worse if you censure, what you do not understand.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Life well spent is long.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Human subtlety will never devise an invention more beautiful, more simple or more direct than does nature because in her inventions nothing is lacking, and nothing is superfluous.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The human bird shall take his first flight, filling the world with amazement, all writings with his fame, and bringing eternal glory to the nest whence he sprang.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Nature never breaks her own laws.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Beyond a doubt truth bears the same relation to falsehood as light to darkness.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Painting is concerned with all the 10 attributes of sight; which are: Darkness, Light, Solidity and Colour, Form and Position, Distance and Propinquity, Motion and Rest.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The natural desire of good men is knowledge.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Common Sense is that which judges the things given to it by other senses.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Medicine is the restoration of discordant elements; sickness is the discord of the elements infused into the living body.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Science is the captain, and practice the soldiers.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: You can have no dominion greater or less than that over yourself.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Knowledge of the past and of the places of the earth is the ornament and food of the mind of man.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: As every divided kingdom falls, so every mind divided between many studies confounds and saps itself.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Every action needs to be prompted by a motive.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: In rivers, the water that you touch is the last of what has passed and the first of that which comes; so with present time.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: How many emperors and how many princes have lived and died and no record of them remains, and they only sought to gain dominions and riches in order that their fame might be ever-lasting.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Necessity is the mistress and guide of nature. Necessity is the theme and inventress of nature, her curb and her eternal law.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Experience never errs; it is only your judgments that err by promising themselves effects such as are not caused by your experiments.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The senses are of the earth, the reason stands apart from them in contemplation.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The mind of the painter must resemble a mirror, which always takes the colour of the object it reflects and is completely occupied by the images of as many objects as are in front of it.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I have found that, in the composition of the human body as compared with the bodies of animals, the organs of sense are duller and coarser. Thus, it is composed of less ingenious instruments, and of spaces less capacious for receiving the faculties of sense.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I have wasted my hours.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: For, verily, great love springs from great knowledge of the beloved object, and if you little know it, you will be able to love it only little or not at all.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The poet ranks far below the painter in the representation of visible things, and far below the musician in that of invisible things.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Experience does not err. Only your judgments err by expecting from her what is not in her power.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: It is better to imitate ancient than modern work.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: To such an extent does nature delight and abound in variety that among her trees there is not one plant to be found which is exactly like another; and not only among the plants, but among the boughs, the leaves and the fruits, you will not find one which is exactly similar to another.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The truth of things is the chief nutriment of superior intellects.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The length of a man's outspread arms is equal to his height.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Our body is dependant on Heaven and Heaven on the Spirit.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Many are they who have a taste and love for drawing, but no talent; and this will be discernible in boys who are not diligent and never finish their drawings with shading.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The painter who draws merely by practice and by eye, without any reason, is like a mirror which copies every thing placed in front of it without being conscious of their existence.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: All knowledge which ends in words will die as quickly as it came to life, with the exception of the written word: which is its mechanical part.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The divisions of Perspective are 3, as used in drawing; of these, the first includes the diminution in size of opaque objects; the second treats of the diminution and loss of outline in such opaque objects; the third, of the diminution and loss of colour at long distances.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Weight, force and casual impulse, together with resistance, are the four external powers in which all the visible actions of mortals have their being and their end.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Just as courage is the danger of life, so is fear its safeguard.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Although nature commences with reason and ends in experience it is necessary for us to do the opposite, that is to commence with experience and from this to proceed to investigate the reason.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Good men by nature, wish to know. I know that many will call this useless work... men who desire nothing but material riches and are absolutely devoid of that of wisdom, which is the food and only true riches of the mind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: I have always felt it is my destiny to build a machine that would allow man to fly.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The spirit desires to remain with its body, because, without the organic instruments of that body, it can neither act, nor feel anything.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: It seems that it had been destined before that I should occupy myself so thoroughly with the vulture, for it comes to my mind as a very early memory, when I was still in the cradle, a vulture came down to me, he opened my mouth with his tail and struck me a few times with his tail against my lips.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: There is no object so large but that at a great distance from the eye it does not appear smaller than a smaller object near.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: In order to arrive at knowledge of the motions of birds in the air, it is first necessary to acquire knowledge of the winds, which we will prove by the motions of water in itself, and this knowledge will be a step enabling us to arrive at the knowledge of beings that fly between the air and the wind.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Man and animals are in reality vehicles and conduits of food, tombs of animals, hostels of Death, coverings that consume, deriving life by the death of others.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: Each man is always in the middle of the surface of the earth and under the zenith of his own hemisphere, and over the centre of the earth.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: People talk to people who perceive nothing, who have open eyes and see nothing; they shall talk to them and receive no answer; they shall adore those who have ears and hear nothing; they shall burn lamps for those who do not see.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: The painter who is familiar with the nature of the sinews, muscles, and tendons, will know very well, in giving movement to a limb, how many and which sinews cause it; and which muscle, by swelling, causes the contraction of that sinew; and which sinews, expanded into the thinnest cartilage, surround and support the said muscle.
Author: Leonardo da Vinci

Quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: You don't get what you want in life. You get who you are!
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: When life knocks you down, try to land on your back. Because if you can look up, you can get up. Let your reason get you back up.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: You must remain focused on your journey to greatness.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you fall, fall on your back. If you can look up, you can get up.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Review your goals twice every day in order to be focused on achieving them.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Honor your commitments with integrity.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: We are living in very challenging times. Pressured in the workplace and stressed out at home, people are trying to make sense of their lives.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Other people's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: There are winners, there are losers and there are people who have not yet learned how to win.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you put yourself in a position where you have to stretch outside your comfort zone, then you are forced to expand your consciousness.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Your ability to communicate is an important tool in your pursuit of your goals, whether it is with your family, your co-workers or your clients and customers.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Anytime you suffer a setback or disappointment, put your head down and plow ahead.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: You need to make a commitment, and once you make it, then life will give you some answers.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Forgive those who have hurt you.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: I advise you to say your dream is possible and then overcome all inconveniences, ignore all the hassles and take a running leap through the hoop, even if it is in flames.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Goals help you channel your energy into action.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Easy is not an option!
Author: Les Brown

Quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: In day-to-day commerce, television is not so much interested in the business of communications as in the business of delivering audiences to advertisers. People are the merchandise, not the shows. The shows are merely the bait.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: You take on the responsibility for making your dream a reality.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: We must look for ways to be an active force in our own lives. We must take charge of our own destinies, design a life of substance and truly begin to live our dreams.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you are carrying strong feelings about something that happened in your past, they may hinder your ability to live in the present.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: We were all born with a certain degree of power. The key to success is discovering this innate power and using it daily to deal with whatever challenges come our way.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Unlike productions in the other arts, all television shows are born to destroy two other shows.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Where do we enroll in Life 101? Where are the classes dealing with the loss of a job, the death of a loved one, the failure of a relationship? Unfortunately, those lessons are mostly learned through trial by fire and the school of hard knocks.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: The best gifts are those we not only cherish but put to use.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: Today, you expand or you are expendable.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: All of us need to grow continuously in our lives.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: I feel like whatever is meant is meant. I feel like this is already written.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I've been through all the bad parts of the streets.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I got a boss mentality.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: My story is going to be completely different than someone else's story in terms of hard work. What I might feel like is hard work, another person is dying to do.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I just got an ear for the kind of things I like.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I just save my money, man. I don't even try to enjoy it like these other rappers; they having fun and they lit, but they gon' be broke later on. I be savin', I be chillin'. It feels good to know I got it, but it feel better to know I'ma keep it too.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I got the name Lil Baby because I always hung around older dudes.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I grew up listening to everybody.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Whether I'm at the gas station or I be at the store, I be there by myself. I be regular.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Every day I'm getting shaped and molded. Keepin' on, being a better artist, and improving on this, improving on that. The more I'm in it, the more I'm practicing and the more I'm advancing.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: If you're a young black dude from the hood you want to come through the hood in a car that makes a lot of noise.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I'm changing every day as far as this rap thing. I'm learning new things. I'm getting bigger by the day.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I have an impact and people look up to me now. It's more than the money.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I just want to be that to my children. The ultimate father.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: My ultimate goal is my son, and a lot of other kids, to not have to grow up the way I grew up. I just give them a different outlook on something. I want to let them know they can have this much fun by doing something legal like me rapping for instance.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I ain't never had nothing good in life.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Everyone has said I got my own sound.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Young Thug, he gave me all the jewels. He literally paid me to leave the neighborhood.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I want to be a superhero dad to where my kid feel like everything I do is nothing wrong.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I'm used to having money and the stuff I do, but it's more of how I'm doing it now. I walk outside and people know me, and I really get paid for shows.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: To me, I'm on a whole different level of rapping.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I can't really describe my sound.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I've grown, and my passion for music has grown. I've become more advanced and I've enhanced my vocabulary. All around artist development.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I'm a rapper but I'm more of a hustler.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I'm all about giving up-and-coming people a chance.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: The Migos, like anybody I ever been in the studio with, like an influence on my rap. I take this from him and him and him and, you know, put it with myself and make it work like that.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Like you might love watching basketball, but that don't mean that you'll get on the court.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Gunna ain't never wrote no song for me. He just showed me how to rap.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I like music, I listened to all rappers; people like Jeezy, Yo Gotti, T.I.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I was telling people like 'My Dawg' gon' be the song that get me out there. I knew it.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I always knew 'My Dawg' would be a hit, but I didn't even know what a hit was. When I made the song I knew it sounded hard.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I never knew anything about rapping.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Like people coming up to me like, 'Nobody ever told you that you look like Lil Baby?' But I'll be like, nah. Or like, somebody told me that. I'll never just say, it's me.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: There's certain little sounds that I just like to hear.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I don't really have a writing process. I don't write at all but, honestly, I feel like it's a modern-day writing because everything is technology and if I go in there and freestyle and I keep it, I feel like I wrote that. If I go in there and fix it, it's almost like something I wrote.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: Gunna was the second person I ever made a song with.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I got more songs with Gunna than anybody - that's like the only person who I'm around!
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: A lot of songs I'm kind of singing and rapping.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I used to always be in Atlanta, chilling. I didn't really have as much to do. So I would gamble as a hobby. Now I'd rather go into the studio and try to make me a hit.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I know I can't rap forever, but I know as long as I got a label or something I can get money forever.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I don't really know the logistics of a Soundcloud rapper.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I done paid Gunna to write my songs. I never put the songs out but like when I first started rapping I used to pay him like $100 like 'I'ma give you a $100 write something for me so I can try to learn to go in and record it.'
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: The rap game is kinda crazy, so I go with the flow but make sure that I cover my bases and do whatever to make sure I'm good no matter what.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: The first project, I made 16 songs and put 12 of them on the mixtape.
Author: Lil Baby

Quote: I'm just trying to show people that I ain't gotta ride off no movement. I can ride off myself.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Everybody always going to sound like somebody. You got to separate yourself.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: You got to have a strong mind if you fall back. When you fall back, they going to count you out. So you got to have a strong mind and know your worth. When you come back, you've got to be different and even more better.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'm my own boss, you know?
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: There's definitely a lot of responsibility to keep the good energy going.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'm happy with the person I become.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'm really living my dream so if I were to change anything up, I probably wouldn't be where I am.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Put your own twist to it. That's how you say relevant. Or things get old and boring.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: We came from nothing really. One house. Ten people. Even days the lights was off. The worst days was not eating. Surviving off rice and toast.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'll never stick to one sound, I switch it up.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I gotta stay in that light where people will see me and hear me. And not be scared of me, you know?
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I don't wish jail on nobody, not even my worst enemies.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I had a bad background just growing up as a child.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: My message is just showing people how I came from nothing.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Once upon a time, I was really lost. I was 18 going on 19, and I was shy. All I want to do is get money, and the way I was thinking I was going to do that was a negative route.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I grew up without a father, so I have to be on point for my kids.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: It feels good to be in a place now where I can give back to my community.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I just want to be there for my kids.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I don't want to try to piggyback off of anybody else.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I don't throw shade at anybody like, 'You sound like me.'
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Always read your contract. Know what you're getting yourself into. Know your worth.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I use the studio as my drug. That's where I relieve everything at - the studio.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I made 'LS4TS2' for women, my Day 1's, the trenches, and all those that doubted me.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I wanna get the streets riled back up. I wanna get super tours and bookings.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: It's either you finna create your own wave, you finna sound like me or you finna sound like G Herbo, you finna sound like Chance The Rapper, you finna sound like Juice Wrld. You ain't gonna get too far 'cause you sound like somebody. So, create your own lane and do your own style.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I just wanted to speak to the streets and give them motivation on making it out. Whatever situation they're in, know that they can make do and have a better life.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I can buy anything I want now. It hasn't changed me personally. It just changed what I can do for myself and my family.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I don't think anybody feels safe in Chicago. Bullets ain't got no name on them.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I was 17 and out of school, living with my mom, starving, not eating, getting locked up, no focus, no guidance. When you ain't got no guidance, you can't do too much. But then I had my first son and started working. I got the right people around me.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'm always going to be able to touch fans and get new fans because everybody goes through something everyday. I just keep touching different subjects by talking to the streets and reaching out to my fans by telling them a story instead of just giving them music to listen.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I never thought I would see the outside of Chicago.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I just moved to Atlanta so the change of scenery and environment put me in a different mood and a different vibe, both good.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I don't want my kids to be on the streets period. I want my kids to be nerds. I want them to be book smart or playing sports - I don't want them to know nothing about the streets.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I worked with Ty Dolla Sign, YG, Nipsey Hussle, Metro Boomin - I build relationships, and I try to stay afloat with everyone who is hot or cool, period.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: 'L's,' it represents life. That's what I represent it as, life. When you throw the L's up for life, you can't go wrong. Like, no gang-banging, nothing like that.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I just want to paint that picture of Chicago that everybody's missing, and I just want to rap about it.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Death can happen anywhere, but kids in Chicago, like 4 years old, can get shot. You don't really hear that in too many places.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I like aiming for the producers who are hungry. I don't chase the wave.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I would say I grew without a doubt. My whole energy in life - as an artist and as a person - has definitely got me smarter and wiser.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I met Jay Z. I don't really care about all that though.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: You've got Lil Uzi Vert - you do a song with him, you ain't doing nothing but gaining new fans. You gotta keep up with the time and the pace.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I wasn't really into music. I was into the streets. I was too worried about the streets and how I was going to eat and how I was going to make the streets happen.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: In Chicago, a lot of people don't really got nothing to live for. Everybody can't ball. Everybody can't rap. Nobody is really doing those activities. There's nothing to do but the streets.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: When I do shows, I take pictures and make the fans feel like family. All of that really matters. That's the cheat code if you ain't got a hit.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I rock with Chance, I rock with Kanye, I rock with Common.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I want to do, like, 50 records.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I have three kids, and that's a big part of staying focused.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I listen to different artists. I open my mind to different artists.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: With 'LilDurk2x,' it's a good vibe to it, good energy.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I let my team pick what order the records go. I don't pick my own records. I'm a fan of my music regardless so you have to think outside of the box.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: When I began to rap, I wasn't taking it real serious. As I start seeing good things, it's getting serious.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I let my partners and my DJ listen to my songs and if they say, 'Oh yeah I felt that one' or 'I am feeling that' then I write it down and we just continue building the album from there.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: My father being incarcerated for 25 years, 26 years, so I had a rough past, but me moving to Atlanta, I just thought that changed my whole identity - my thinking.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I want to relate. I don't want to just rap and go to the next album.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Moving to Atlanta is one of the best things I did.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: A lot of projects I do be all 'real' music.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Atlanta is just different. It's the music city.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: What really broke it down was I had my son while I was locked up, so that really affected me. I can't really have this, knowing my father was locked up when I was small. So that really out of everything - through the fame, the money, everything - that really put the toll on me: 'Oh yeah, I gotta change.'
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Growing up in Chicago is hard. I'd say 80 percent of the people ain't really got no daddies. Their household wasn't right. All they know is the streets and getting some money to support each other and support their family.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: You got to want to evolve. It's something you can practice on but it just came to me. I wasn't really sitting there like, 'What can I do to get better?' It just came to me, talking to my people and my crew. They just tell me what my strongest and weakest points are at.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I'm big on the studio. I like to stay in it 24/7.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I been living down in Atlanta, but everyone back home has been in my thoughts, especially those doing something for the community and all the neighborhood heroes. I thought about all the first responders putting their lives on the line to help out and it inspired me, so I took a jet back to Chicago to show my thanks.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: If you got a vibe with a producer I think you should go full-fledged instead of being satisfied with two songs.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I've been with Def Jam Records for five years and they gave me my first recording contract so for that I'm forever grateful.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Something happened in the studio that was between me and Tyga that ain't supposed to escalate, but it did. Something happened with a song we did, and he ain't like it.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: See what I do is I book a studio that's closed down and I go by myself. No one's in there, literally just me and the engineer.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I was 17 when I first started rapping and 18 before I started taking it seriously - when I really knew I could rap and have fans and be a trendsetter.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: 'Trap House' is one of my favorite songs off '300 Days 300 Nights' mixtape, I sent it to Thug, he loved it and knocked it out on the spot in Atlanta.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I want my kids to be able to live comfortable and go to school and to be into sports.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: My thing is to get new fans. So I love when people say, 'Oh, I've heard of him before.' Or 'I've never heard of Durk.' Or 'I'm a fan of Durk today.' This is what I like to see, because it lets me know when I come out with something that it's going to work.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Rapping is my dream, but my kids make me happy.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Certain parts are bad in every city, but Chicago is beautiful.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: No shade to the other artists in Chicago... but if you got confidence in yourself and you know you're Number One, say it.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: When you in the studio you don't need everybody calling your phone telling you about what's going on outside the studio. I don't need those distractions.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I think every artist should go for a Grammy.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I grew as an artist and a person. I'm just ready to work, get this money, get this new fan base and tour all over the world.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I feel like with '2.5,' I created another style that nobody else is coming with.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Bone Thugs is one of my favorite rap groups of all time. I listened to them all the time when I was a kid.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I stay in the studio. I'm a studio junkie.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: Atlanta is definitely where it's at. I still go back to Chicago a lot though, I got family there.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: I ain't expect it. I just expected to be Chicago famous - 'hood famous. I ain't expect to be outside-of-Chicago famous.
Author: Lil Durk

Quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He who is brave is free.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A man who suffers before it is necessary, suffers more than is necessary.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A sword never kills anybody; it is a tool in the killer's hand.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Death is the wish of some, the relief of many, and the end of all.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: All cruelty springs from weakness.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Our plans miscarry because they have no aim. When a man does not know what harbor he is making for, no wind is the right wind.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: You must live for another if you wish to live for yourself.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Life, if well lived, is long enough.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Luck is a matter of preparation meeting opportunity.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Be wary of the man who urges an action in which he himself incurs no risk.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No great genius has ever existed without some touch of madness.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Expecting is the greatest impediment to living. In anticipation of tomorrow, it loses today.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Time discovers truth.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Life is the fire that burns and the sun that gives light. Life is the wind and the rain and the thunder in the sky. Life is matter and is earth, what is and what is not, and what beyond is in Eternity.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He who does not prevent a crime when he can, encourages it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There are more things to alarm us than to harm us, and we suffer more often in apprehension than reality.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: I shall never be ashamed of citing a bad author if the line is good.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: We become wiser by adversity; prosperity destroys our appreciation of the right.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Success is not greedy, as people think, but insignificant. That is why it satisfies nobody.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Every guilty person is his own hangman.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: When I think over what I have said, I envy dumb people.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: For greed all nature is too little.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: In war there is no prize for runner-up.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A physician is not angry at the intemperance of a mad patient, nor does he take it ill to be railed at by a man in fever. Just so should a wise man treat all mankind, as a physician does his patient, and look upon them only as sick and extravagant.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Even after a bad harvest there must be sowing.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: For many men, the acquisition of wealth does not end their troubles, it only changes them.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: If a man knows not what harbor he seeks, any wind is the right wind.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Nothing is so wretched or foolish as to anticipate misfortunes. What madness is it to be expecting evil before it comes.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The things hardest to bear are sweetest to remember.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life, which fade and are tasteless without it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He who has great power should use it lightly.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Genius always gives its best at first; prudence, at last.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The bad fortune of the good turns their faces up to heaven; the good fortune of the bad bows their heads down to the earth.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Constant exposure to dangers will breed contempt for them.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Those who boast of their descent, brag on what they owe to others.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is another's fault if he be ungrateful, but it is mine if I do not give. To find one thankful man, I will oblige a great many that are not so.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There is no person so severely punished, as those who subject themselves to the whip of their own remorse.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Poverty wants some, luxury many, and avarice all things.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Let us train our minds to desire what the situation demands.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: To keep oneself safe does not mean to bury oneself.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is more fitting for a man to laugh at life than to lament over it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There is no delight in owning anything unshared.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Ignorant people see life as either existence or non-existence, but wise men see it beyond both existence and non-existence to something that transcends them both; this is an observation of the Middle Way.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is true greatness to have in one the frailty of a man and the security of a god.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No evil propensity of the human heart is so powerful that it may not be subdued by discipline.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The pressure of adversity does not affect the mind of the brave man... It is more powerful than external circumstances.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A great fortune is a great slavery.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No one is laughable who laughs at himself.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: We should give as we would receive, cheerfully, quickly, and without hesitation; for there is no grace in a benefit that sticks to the fingers.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: You learn to know a pilot in a storm.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A punishment to some, to some a gift, and to many a favor.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Whatever is well said by another, is mine.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No man enjoys the true taste of life, but he who is ready and willing to quit it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: I never come back home with the same moral character I went out with; something or other becomes unsettled where I had achieved internal peace; some one or other of the things I had put to flight reappears on the scene.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is the failing of youth not to be able to restrain its own violence.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Shall I tell you what the real evil is? To cringe to the things that are called evils, to surrender to them our freedom, in defiance of which we ought to face any suffering.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: It is better, of course, to know useless things than to know nothing.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Successful and fortunate crime is called virtue.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No one can be happy who has been thrust outside the pale of truth. And there are two ways that one can be removed from this realm: by lying, or by being lied to.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: We often want one thing and pray for another, not telling the truth even to the gods.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The deferring of anger is the best antidote to anger.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Consult your friend on all things, especially on those which respect yourself. His counsel may then be useful where your own self-love might impair your judgment.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Every reign must submit to a greater reign.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The good things of prosperity are to be wished; but the good things that belong to adversity are to be admired.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A kingdom founded on injustice never lasts.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There is a noble manner of being poor, and who does not know it will never be rich.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He has committed the crime who profits by it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Whenever the speech is corrupted so is the mind.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Life is warfare.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The way is long if one follows precepts, but short... if one follows patterns.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Every man prefers belief to the exercise of judgment.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: If you judge, investigate.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Anger is like those ruins which smash themselves on what they fall.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Shun no toil to make yourself remarkable by some talent or other; yet do not devote yourself to one branch exclusively. Strive to get clear notions about all. Give up no science entirely; for science is but one.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He that does good to another does good also to himself.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: If thou art a man, admire those who attempt great things, even though they fail.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: I will govern my life and thoughts as if the whole world were to see the one and read the other, for what does it signify to make anything a secret to my neighbor, when to God, who is the searcher of our hearts, all our privacies are open?
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Shame may restrain what law does not prohibit.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: We should every night call ourselves to an account: what infirmity have I mastered today? what passions opposed? what temptation resisted? what virtue acquired? Our vices will abate of themselves if they be brought every day to the shrift.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: I don't trust liberals, I trust conservatives.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: He who has made a fair compact with poverty is rich.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A man's as miserable as he thinks he is.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: What difference does it make how much you have? What you do not have amounts to much more.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Everything is the product of one universal creative effort. There is nothing dead in Nature. Everything is organic and living, and therefore the whole world appears to be a living organism.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: What nature requires is obtainable, and within easy reach. It is for the superfluous we sweat.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Nothing becomes so offensive so quickly as grief. When fresh it finds someone to console it, but when it becomes chronic, it is ridiculed, and rightly.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: One must steer, not talk.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Where fear is, happiness is not.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: Behold a worthy sight, to which the God, turning his attention to his own work, may direct his gaze. Behold an equal thing, worthy of a God, a brave man matched in conflict with evil fortune.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: See how many are better off than you are, but consider how many are worse.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: No untroubled day has ever dawned for me.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: A large part of mankind is angry not with the sins, but with the sinners.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: There is as much greatness of mind in acknowledging a good turn, as in doing it.
Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Quote: So live with men as if God saw you and speak to God, as if men heard you.
