Quote: In baseball, you don't know nothing.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I'm a lucky guy and I'm happy to be with the Yankees. And I want to thank everyone for making this night necessary.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: If people don't want to come to the ballpark, how are you going to stop them?
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I liked St. Louis, when they were in the American League, because that was going home. I had all my family and friends there.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I tell the kids, somebody's gotta win, somebody's gotta lose. Just don't fight about it. Just try to get better.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I enjoy now doing what I do... playing golf, relaxing a little, enjoying life.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: How can you think and hit at the same time?
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: Almost every Monday I have a charity thing. I like that. I do.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: If the people don't want to come out to the ballpark, nobody's going to stop them.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I liked George Weiss when he was with the Yankees. He loved the Old Timers' Day. He loved it. And he invited all these people to come, all these players to come.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I didn't know much about golf growing up.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I think Little League is wonderful. It keeps the kids out of the house.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: It's pretty far, but it doesn't seem like it.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: It's fun; baseball's fun.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I don't mean to be funny.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I don't like seeing myself on television. I don't like it.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: If I didn't make it in baseball, I won't have made it workin'. I didn't like to work.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I don't blame the players today for the money. I blame the owners. They started it. They wanna give it to 'em? More power to 'em.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: If you get a guy that can play a couple positions, it helps you out a real lot.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: A lot of guys go, 'Hey, Yog, say a Yogi-ism.' I tell 'em, 'I don't know any.' They want me to make one up. I don't make 'em up. I don't even know when I say it. They're the truth. And it is the truth. I don't know.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: I always got nervous the nights we played in the World Series. First pitch, I was nervous. Then after that, forget it; I'd start playing.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: The other teams could make trouble for us if they win.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The first step in solving a problem is to recognize that it does exist.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Do more than you are being paid to do, and you'll eventually be paid more for what you do.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Yesterday ended last night. Today is a brand-new day.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Outstanding people have one thing in common: An absolute sense of mission.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you encourage others, you in the process are encouraged because you're making a commitment and difference in that person's life. Encouragement really does make a difference.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don't hold the title of salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I read the paper every day and the Bible every day; that way I know what both sides are up to.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Time can be an ally or an enemy. What it becomes depends entirely upon you, your goals, and your determination to use every available minute.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Every choice you make has an end result.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you don't see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You are who you are and what you are because of what has gone into your mind. You can change who you are and what you are by changing what goes into your mind.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Confidence is going after Moby Dick in a rowboat and taking tartar sauce with you.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Selling is essentially a transfer of feelings.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you go looking for a friend, you're going to find they're very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You can make positive deposits in your own economy every day by reading and listening to powerful, positive, life-changing content and by associating with encouraging and hope-building people.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Isn't it amazing how much stuff we get done the day before vacation?
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: People are basically the same the world over. Everybody wants the same things - to be happy, to be healthy, to be at least reasonably prosperous, and to be secure. They want friends, peace of mind, good family relationships, and hope that tomorrow is going to be even better than today.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Be careful not to compromise what you want most for what you want now.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You've got to be before you can do and do before you can have.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You cannot perform in a manner inconsistent with the way you see yourself.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: People don't buy for logical reasons. They buy for emotional reasons.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Research indicates that employees have three prime needs: Interesting work, recognition for doing a good job, and being let in on things that are going on in the company.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Take time to be kind and to say 'thank you.'
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: You don't drown by falling into water. You only drown if you stay there.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The successful business executive can handle challenges and solve problems at a remarkable clip.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Dreams grow if you grow.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Money is not the most important thing, but when you need it, there are few substitutes. So while I like the things money can buy, I love what money won't buy. It bought me a house but it won't buy me a home. It would buy me a companion but it won't buy me a friend.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: A productive employee who is kept busy working at his or her job is far more likely to be happy at that job and less likely to look for employment elsewhere.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It's not the situation, but whether we react negative or respond positive to the situation that is important.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: For 24 years of my adult life, by choice I weighed well over 200 pounds. I say 'by choice' because I have never 'accidentally' eaten anything, so when I choose to eat too much, I have chosen to weigh too much.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If God would have wanted us to live in a permissive society He would have given us Ten Suggestions and not Ten Commandments.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Your understanding of what you read and hear is, to a very large degree, determined by your vocabulary, so improve your vocabulary daily.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It's absolutely true that unless you can instill discipline upon yourself, you will never be able to lead others.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The person who dumps garbage into your mind will do you considerably more harm than the person who dumps garbage on your floor, because each load of mind garbage negatively impacts your possibilities and lowers your expectations.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: He climbs highest who helps another up.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you want to reach a goal, you must 'see the reaching' in your own mind before you actually arrive at your goal.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The relationships we have with people are extremely important to success on and off the job.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The one thing coaches cannot tolerate... is the individual who grows arrogant because he excelled at a lower level and believes he has nothing else to learn.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The six people who had the biggest impact on my life were all women. Had I been sexist, my life would have been far less fulfilling.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Fact: If standard of living is your number one objective, quality of life almost never improves. But if quality of life is your number one objective, standard of living invariably improves.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Many marriages would be better if the husband and the wife clearly understood that they are on the same side.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I've always taught that a poor economy is the best opportunity for salespeople because the naysayers and grumblers have already given up, leaving more territory, more opportunities to be successful than in a good economy when virtually all salespeople are out there, giving it their best.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: All one needs to do is read - books, magazines, research the Internet - and pay attention to the influencers in their lives to discover the myriad people of strong moral character who have and still are making positive, meaningful contributions and differences in our world.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Success must never be measured by how much money you have.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Send out a cheerful, positive greeting, and most of the time you will get back a cheerful, positive greeting. It's also true that if you send out a negative greeting, you will, in most cases, get back a negative greeting.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you want to earn more, learn more.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I'm a constant learner. You need to be a constant student because things change and you have to change and grow. And I emphasize the word 'grow.'
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Problem-solving becomes a very important part of our makeup as we grow into maturity or move up the corporate ladder.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Until you are happy with who you are, you will never be happy because of what you have.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The top salesperson in the organization probably missed more sales than 90% of the sales people on the team, but they also made more calls than the others made.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: As youngsters, my mother taught her children that while we might not be the smartest people around, we could be courteous, polite and considerate of others.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: New information makes new and fresh ideas possible.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Building a better you is the first step to building a better America.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: We need to understand the difference between discipline and punishment. Punishment is what you do to someone; discipline is what you do for someone.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you treat your wife like a thoroughbred, you'll never end up with a nag.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Husbands and wives, have fun with each other. I'm convinced it makes all the difference in the world.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The problem with pity parties is very few people come, and those who do don't bring presents.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I'm so optimistic, I'd go after Moby Dick in a rowboat and take the tartar sauce with me.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Authors by the hundreds can tell you stories by the thousands of those rejection slips before they found a publisher who was willing to 'gamble' on an unknown.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It might interest you to know that the 1828 Noah Webster Dictionary identifies the optimist in complimentary terms, but says nothing about the pessimist. The word 'pessimist' was not in our vocabulary at that time. It's a modern 'invention' which I believe we should 'dis-invent.'
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Selling is something we do for our clients - not to our clients.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Statistics suggest that when customers complain, business owners and managers ought to get excited about it. The complaining customer represents a huge opportunity for more business.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Little men with little minds and little imaginations go through life in little ruts, smugly resisting all changes which would jar their little worlds.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Time well spent results in more money to spend, more money to save, and more time to vacation.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: In the game of life, before you get anything out, you must put something in!
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Some people do really find fault like there's a reward for it.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I believe it's important that we use names of endearment that reflect a special feeling for the individual involved.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: We hear tears loudly on this side of Heaven. What we don't take time to contemplate are the even louder cheers on the other side of death's valley.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Just saying you are better than good won't make it so. But, when you understand what it takes to live the better than good life, and you apply yourself, your life will truly be better than good.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: U.S. President Theodore Roosevelt has been described as founder of the Bull Moose Party, the man who led his troops up San Juan Hill in the Spanish-American War, a big game hunter, family man, civic servant and a host of other things.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Since belief determines behavior, doesn't it make sense that we should be teaching ethical, moral values in every home and in every school in America?
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: True success has more components than one sentence or idea can contain.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Timid salesmen have skinny kids.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: New research shows that you will be dead longer than you will be alive.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I believe that being successful means having a balance of success stories across the many areas of your life. You can't truly be considered successful in your business life if your home life is in shambles.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Husbands and wives, first be faithful to each other. Second, keep the romance going all of your life by courting each other every day.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If you're going to have to swallow a frog, you don't want to have to look at that sucker too long!
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It is true that integrity alone won't make you a leader, but without integrity you will never be one.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Yes, it's absolutely true that anything worth doing is worth doing poorly - until you can learn to do it well.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I am convinced after more than 50 years in the field of motivation that anyone who wants to learn to look at life and/or their circumstances in a positive light can do so.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: To be candid, some people have given positive thinking a bad name. I can't stand to hear some gung-ho individual say that with positive thinking you can just do 'anything.' If you think about that one for a moment, you recognize the absurdity of it.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Every obnoxious act is a cry for help.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I seldom read anything that is not of a factual nature because I want to invest my time wisely in the things that will improve my life. Don't misunderstand; there is nothing wrong with reading purely for the joy of it. Novels have their place, but biographies of famous men and women contain information that can change lives.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The young athlete who aspires to greatness, generally speaking, learns a number of things from several different coaches. The first one taught him the fundamentals; the second one instilled discipline in him and taught him more of the techniques that must be mastered to excel.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: My favorite writers are all Jews - David, Solomon, Matthew, Mark - well, you get the picture.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Reading has been the fuel of my motivation: it has changed the direction in which I have traveled, and it has enhanced my creative imagination more than any other activity I have ever pursued.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I'm convinced that what kids need today are parents - not buddies. They need someone who will exercise mature judgment.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: At 25, I was in the audience of my first professional speaker, Bob Bales. His presentation got my attention. I had never seen anyone having so much fun 'at work' and getting paid for it!
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Only men of character are trusted.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Athletic skills are acquired over a long period of time and after countless hours of practice.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Most people consider me an optimist because I laughingly state that I would take my last two dollars and buy a money belt.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Fortunately, problems are an everyday part of our life. Consider this: If there were no problems, most of us would be unemployed.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Goals enable you to do more for yourself and others, too.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: We all prospect, and don't even know we're doing it. When you start the dating process, you are actually prospecting for the person you want to marry. When you're interviewing employees, you are prospecting for someone who will best fit your needs.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Profitability comes from loyalty, productivity, and having a character base from which to work.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I read for the 'ah-ha's,' the information that makes a light bulb go off in my mind. I want to put information in my mind that is going to be the most beneficial to me, my family and my fellow man - financially, morally, spiritually, and emotionally.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: It will be disastrous when a leader or manager shows up with one attitude one day and treats people with a different attitude the next day.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The right quote can inspire people to change their ways.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Personal discipline, when it becomes a way of life in our personal, family, and career lives, will enable us to do some incredible things.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I was in that part of the class that made the top half possible.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Andy Andrews is the best speaker I have ever seen.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: There is a certain amount of dissatisfaction that goes with knowing your time, talent and abilities are not being properly used.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Be there for your kids. Later, when you need them, they'll be there for you.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I took up an offer for me to lose 30 pounds in 30 days. It worked. I lost 30 days!
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you are truly interested in other people, you will learn what they are interested in and if they have a need for your product. If they like you, and most people like folks who take an interest in them, they'll help you find people who do need what you have to sell, even if they don't.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: A plan is always successful if the plan is good.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I once dieted so religiously I quit eating in church.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If my life has had a theme, I suppose it has been a typical American theme in that, for most of it, I have been looking for happiness and success.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I'm constantly amazed that owners and managers of all businesses don't train their people to call the person who pays by credit card by name. It definitely makes the customer feel good and will be a factor in bringing them back to your place of business.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: There's never been a doctor who served many patients who, despite their best efforts, did not lose some of them to death. But they understood that was part of life itself.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you make a promise, keep it.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Whether it's eight o'clock in the morning or eight o'clock at night, I always try to greet others before they have a chance to speak to me.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When you give directives to a child, especially a teenager, you must consider the nature of your child.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Courage is on display every day, and only the courageous wring the most out of life.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Champions invariably have fervent philosophical beliefs. Philosophy, in its simplest terms, means 'the love of wisdom.'
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: If your watch is slow by just four minutes, that's not much - unless you've been warned that if you're even one minute late ever again you will be fired. Then four minutes make a big difference.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: My first professional job was to sell heavy-duty waterless cookware.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When I became proficient as a salesman I was invited to teach new hires.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: I've got to confess I'm a pragmatic optimist myself.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The problem is not getting rid of fear, but using it properly.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Wally Amos is the classic example of a man who gets up again and again.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: When there is no job related stress, you are more aware of your mate and children, if you are a parent.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Being productive gives people a sense of satisfaction and fulfillment that loafing never can.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Kids instinctively know - although they will argue to the contrary - that they really are not mature enough to make good decisions on some important issues.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Many people who want to be great aren't willing to do the work to make it possible!
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: Now's the best time you'll ever have in life to get ahead!
Author: Zig Ziglar
